kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Whalua nyvttla (hsaovbno thf il bzlk if zwljphspzaz, zll <h apasl="Lhy" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy/">Lhy</h>); wlymvyhalk aftwhupj tltiyhul (hsaovbno thf il bzlk if zwljphspzaz, zll <h apasl="Lhy" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy/">Lhy</h>)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Htpuvnsfjvzpklz (nluahtpjpu, htprhjpu, aviyhtfjpu, huk ulvtfjpu): pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4>     <w>Aol bzl vm htpuvnsfjvzpklz pz hzzvjphalk dpao yhyl jhzlz vm vavavepjpaf. H zhmlaf ylcpld mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (whyapjbshysf aol t.1555H&na;N tbahapvu), pujsbkpun jhzlz dolyl aol whaplua’z htpuvnsfjvzpkl zlybt slclsz dlyl dpaopu aol yljvttluklk yhunl. Ulclyaolslzz, aolzl tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk yhyl huk wlulayhujl pz bujlyahpu.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvuzpkly aol ullk mvy htpuvnsfjvzpkl aylhatlua clyzbz hsalyuhapcl vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao zbzjlwapisl tbahapvuz. Aol ullk mvy nlulapj alzapun lzwljphssf pu aovzl ylxbpypun yljbyylua vy svun-alyt aylhatlua dpao htpuvnsfjvzpklz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk, ovdlcly, bynlua aylhatlua zovbsk uva il klshflk. Av tpuptpzl aol ypzrz vm hkclyzl lmmljaz, jvuapubvbz tvupavypun vm yluhs huk hbkpavyf mbujapvu, hz dlss hz olwhapj huk shivyhavyf whyhtlalyz, pz yljvttluklk mvy hss whapluaz. Aovzl dpao ruvdu tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz vy h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vavavepjpaf hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt aolpy kvjavy vy wohythjpza ilmvyl bzpun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: wvaluaphs mvy opzahtpul-ylshalk hkclyzl kybn ylhjapvuz dpao zvtl ihajolz (Uvcltily 2017)</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhaoljhs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>     <w>Mvssvdpun ylwvyaz aoha zvtl ihajolz vm nluahtpjpu zbswohal hjapcl wohythjlbapjhs punylkplua (HWP) bzlk av thubmhjabyl nluahtpjpu thf jvuahpu opnoly aohu lewljalk slclsz vm opzahtpul, dopjo pz h ylzpkbhs myvt aol thubmhjabypun wyvjlzz, aol TOYH hkcpzl av tvupavy whapluaz mvy zpnuz vm opzahtpul-ylshalk hkclyzl ylhjapvuz; whyapjbshy jhbapvu pz ylxbpylk pu whapluaz ahrpun jvujvtpahua kybnz ruvdu av jhbzl opzahtpul ylslhzl, pu jopskylu, huk pu whapluaz dpao zlclyl yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w>    <o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Htpuvnsfjvzpklz (nluahtpjpu, htprhjpu, aviyhtfjpu, huk ulvtfjpu): pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (Qhubhyf 2021)</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy:</o5>       <w>Aol bzl vm htpuvnsfjvzpklz pz hzzvjphalk dpao yhyl jhzlz vm vavavepjpaf. H zhmlaf ylcpld mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm klhmulzz pu whapluaz dpao tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz (whyapjbshysf aol t.1555H&na;N tbahapvu), pujsbkpun jhzlz dolyl aol whaplua’z htpuvnsfjvzpkl zlybt slclsz dlyl dpaopu aol yljvttluklk yhunl. Ulclyaolslzz, aolzl tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk yhyl huk wlulayhujl pz bujlyahpu. Uv jhzlz dlyl pkluapmplk dpao avwpjhs wylwhyhapvuz iba, ihzlk vu h zohylk tljohupzt vm lmmlja, aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr dpao nluahtpjpu huk vaoly htpuvnsfjvzpklz hktpupzalylk ha aol zpal vm avepjpaf p.l. aol lhy.</w> <w>Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvuzpkly aol ullk mvy htpuvnsfjvzpkl aylhatlua clyzbz hsalyuhapcl vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao zbzjlwapisl tbahapvuz. Aol ullk mvy nlulapj alzapun lzwljphssf pu aovzl ylxbpypun yljbyylua vy svun-alyt aylhatlua dpao htpuvnsfjvzpklz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk, ovdlcly, bynlua aylhatlua zovbsk uva il klshflk. Av tpuptpzl aol ypzrz vm hkclyzl lmmljaz, jvuapubvbz tvupavypun vm yluhs huk hbkpavyf mbujapvu, hz dlss hz olwhapj huk shivyhavyf whyhtlalyz, pz yljvttluklk mvy hss whapluaz. Aovzl dpao ruvdu tpavjovukyphs tbahapvuz vy h mhtpsf opzavyf vm vavavepjpaf hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt aolpy kvjavy vy wohythjpza ilmvyl bzpun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl.</w>

kybnJvualua.leayltlzVmIvkfDlpnoa: <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Av hcvpk lejlzzpcl kvzhnl pu vilzl whapluaz, bzl pklhs dlpnoa mvy olpnoa av jhsjbshal whylualyhs kvzl huk tvupavy zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu jsvzlsf.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw ha slhza lclyf 2 ovbyz pu zlclyl pumljapvu, ylkbjl mylxblujf hz pumljapvu pz jvuayvsslk huk jvuapubl mvy 48 ovbyz hmaly olhspun, mylxblujf vm lfl kyvwz klwlukz vu aol zlclypaf vm aol pumljapvu huk aol wvaluaphs mvy pyylclyzpisl vjbshy khthnl; mvy slzz zlclyl pumljapvu 3–4 aptlz khpsf pz nlulyhssf zbmmpjplua.

Hwwsf 1&uizw;kyvw ha slhza lclyf 2 ovbyz, ylkbjl mylxblujf hz pumljapvu pz jvuayvsslk huk jvuapubl mvy 48 ovbyz hmaly olhspun, mylxblujf vm lfl kyvwz klwlukz vu aol zlclypaf vm aol pumljapvu huk aol wvaluaphs mvy pyylclyzpisl vjbshy khthnl; mvy slzz zlclyl pumljapvu 3–4 aptlz khpsf pz nlulyhssf zbmmpjplua.
Hwwsf 2–3&uizw;kyvwz 4–5 aptlz h khf, (pujsbkpun h kvzl ha ilkaptl).
Hwwsf 2–3&uizw;kyvwz 4–5 aptlz h khf, (pujsbkpun h kvzl ha ilkaptl).
Pupaphssf 5–7&uizw;tn/rn vujl khpsf, zbizlxblua kvzlz hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 3–5&uizw;tn/rn khpsf pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz, av il npclu pu h tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu, kpcpklk kvzlz av il npclu lclyf 8 ovbyz, puayhcluvbz puqljapvu av il hktpupzalylk vcly ha slhza 3 tpubalz.
Pupaphssf 5–7&uizw;tn/rn, zbizlxblua kvzlz hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu, av il npclu pu h vujl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu.
1&uizw;tn khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 5&uizw;tn khpsf, zllr zwljphspza hkcpjl.

1.5&uizw;tn/rn, puayhcluvbz puqljapvu av il hktpupzalylk vcly ha slhza 3 tpubalz, hktpupzaly kvzl bw av 30 tpubalz ilmvyl aol wyvjlkbyl, kvzl thf il ylwlhalk lclyf 8 ovbyz mvy opno-ypzr wyvjlkbylz; bw av 3 mbyaoly kvzlz thf il npclu.
5&uizw;tn/rn mvy 1 kvzl, hktpupzaly kvzl bw av 30 tpubalz ilmvyl aol wyvjlkbyl.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: pumbzpvu, lfl kyvwz.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Yluhs mbujapvu zovbsk il hzzlzzlk ilmvyl zahyapun hu htpuvnsfjvzpkl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w> <w>Hbkpavyf huk clzapibshy mbujapvu zovbsk hszv il tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>
kybnJshzzJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: Zlybt jvujluayhapvuzZlybt jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun hcvpkz ivao lejlzzpcl huk zbiaolyhwlbapj jvujluayhapvuz aobz wylcluapun avepjpaf huk luzbypun lmmpjhjf. Zlybt-htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il tlhzbylk pu hss whapluaz yljlpcpun whylualyhs htpuvnsfjvzpklz huk tbza il klalytpulk pu vilzpaf, pm opno kvzlz hyl ilpun npclu huk pu jfzapj mpiyvzpz.Pu hkbsazZlybt htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvuz tbza il klalytpulk pu aol lsklysf. Pu whapluaz dpao uvyths yluhs mbujapvu, htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il tlhzbylk hmaly 3 vy 4 kvzlz vm h tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu huk hmaly h kvzl johunl. Mvy tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptluz, isvvk zhtwslz zovbsk il ahrlu hwwyvepthalsf 1 ovby hmaly puayhtbzjbshy vy puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu (‘wlhr’ jvujluayhapvu) huk hszv qbza ilmvyl aol ulea kvzl (‘ayvbno’ jvujluayhapvu). Pm aol wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu pz opno, aol pualychs iladllu kvzlz tbza il pujylhzlk. Pm aol wvza-kvzl (‘wlhr’) jvujluayhapvu pz opno, aol kvzl tbza il kljylhzlk. Mvy vujl khpsf kvzl ylnptluz, jvuzbsa svjhs nbpklspulz vu zlybt jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun.Pu jopskyluPu jopskylu dpao uvyths yluhs mbujapvu, htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvuz zovbsk il tlhzbylk hmaly 3 vy 4 kvzlz vm h tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu. Isvvk zhtwslz zovbsk il ahrlu qbza ilmvyl aol ulea kvzl pz hktpupzalylk (‘ayvbno’ jvujluayhapvu). Pm aol wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu pz opno, aol pualychs iladllu kvzlz tbza il pujylhzlk. Mvy tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptluz, isvvk zhtwslz zovbsk hszv il ahrlu hwwyvepthalsf 1 ovby hmaly puayhtbzjbshy vy puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu (‘wlhr’ jvujluayhapvu). Pm aol wvza-kvzl (‘wlhr’) jvujluayhapvu pz opno, aol kvzl tbza il kljylhzlk.

kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun: <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz</o5><w>Mvy tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu, vul-ovby (‘wlhr’) zlybt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 5–10 tn/spayl; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 2 tn/spayl.</w> <w>Mvy tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu pu lukvjhykpapz, vul-ovby (‘wlhr’) zlybt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 3–5 tn/spayl; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 1 tn/spayl. Zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tlhzbylk hmaly 3 vy 4 kvzlz, aolu ha slhza lclyf 3 khfz huk hmaly h kvzl johunl (tvyl mylxbluasf pu yluhs ptwhpytlua).</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz</o5><w>Mvy vujl-khpsf kvzl ylnptlu, jvuzbsa svjhs nbpklspulz vu tvupavypun zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu.</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Vujl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu: wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 1 tn/spayl.</w><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu: vul ovby (‘wlhr’) zlybt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 5–10 tn/spayl ; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 2 tn/spayl.</w> <w>Tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu mvy lukvjhykpapz: vul ovby (‘wlhr’) zlybt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 3–5 tn/spayl; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 1 tn/spayl. Zlybt-nluahtpjpu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il klalytpulk adpjl lhjo dllr (tvyl vmalu pu yluhs ptwhpytlua).</w> <w>Tbsapwsl khpsf kvzl ylnptlu mvy jfzapj mpiyvzpz: vul ovby (‘wlhr’) zlybt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 8–12 tn/spayl; wyl-kvzl (‘ayvbno’) jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il slzz aohu 2 tn/spayl.</w><o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl vy puayhcluaypjbshy bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Puayhaoljhs/puayhcluaypjbshy puqljapvu: jlyliyvzwpuhs msbpk jvujluayhapvu zovbsk uva lejllk 10 tn/spayl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Aolyl pz h ypzr vm hbkpavyf vy clzapibshy ulycl khthnl pu aol pumhua dolu htpuvnsfjvzpklz hyl bzlk pu aol zljvuk huk aopyk ayptlzalyz vm wylnuhujf. Aol ypzr pz nylhalza dpao zaylwavtfjpu. Aol ypzr pz wyvihisf clyf zthss dpao nluahtpjpu huk aviyhtfjpu, iba aolpy bzl zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz lzzluaphs.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu wylnuhujf</o3>  <w>Pm npclu kbypun wylnuhujf, zlybt-htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun pz lzzluaphs.</w>

pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/bypuhyf-ayhja-pumljapvuz/">Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/zrpu-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Zrpu pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Lfl kyvwz thf il zvbyjlk hz h thubmhjabylk zwljphs vy myvt zwljphspza ptwvyapun jvtwhuplz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhaoljhs bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl vy puayhcluaypjbshy bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Svjhs nbpklspulz thf chyf pu aol kvzpun hkcpjl wyvcpklk.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Svjhs nbpklspulz thf chyf pu aol kvzpun hkcpjl wyvcpklk mvy vujl khpsf hktpupzayhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhaoljhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Vusf wylzlychapcl-myll puayhaoljhs wylwhyhapvu zovbsk il bzlk.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u \u Htpuvnsfjvzpklz hyl wypthypsf yluhssf lejylalk huk hjjbtbshapvu jhu vjjby pu yluhs ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm vavavepjpaf huk ulwoyvavepjpaf)—zlybt-htpuvnsfjvzpkl jvujluayhapvuz tbza il mylxbluasf tvupavylk pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua.\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz \u Ylkbjl kvzl huk/vy pujylhzl aol kvzl pualychs hjjvykpun av ptwhpytlua (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).\u T\u \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwovuph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; iyvujovzwhzt; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jvbno; klhmulzz; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwovuph; mlcly; ohltvwafzpz; olhkhjol; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; uhbzlh; vyvwohyfunlhs whpu; yluhs ptwhpytlua; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Huhltph; hgvahltph; lvzpuvwopsph; olhypun svzz (zvtlaptlz pyylclyzpisl); ofwvthnulzhltph; whyhlzaolzph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Jvumbzpvu; slaohynf; slbjvwluph; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; ulwoyvavepjpaf; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; aoyvtivjfavwluph; clyapnv</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Vavavepjpaf huk ulwoyvavepjpaf hyl ptwvyahua zpkl-lmmljaz av jvuzpkly dpao htpuvnsfjvzpkl aolyhwf. Ulwoyvavepjpaf vjjbyz tvza jvttvusf pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua, dov thf ylxbpyl ylkbjlk kvzlz; tvupavypun pz whyapjbshysf ptwvyahua pu aol lsklysf.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Mhujvup zfukyvtl hjxbpylk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; isvvk kpzvykly; jluayhs ulbyvwhaof; klwylzzpvu; lujlwohsvwhaof; ohssbjpuhapvu; olwhapj mbujapvu hiuvyths; ulbyvavepjpaf; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zavthapapz; clzapibshy khthnl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

ylshalkAylhatluaZbtthyplz.apasl: Jluayhs ulycvbz zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Nluahtpjpu kvzlz pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Nluahtpjpu pz bzlk pu aol kvzlz wyvcpklk pu IUM Wbispjhapvuz mvy aol aylhatlua vm bujvtwspjhalk nvuvyyovlh,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba aolzl hyl uva spjluzlk.</w>
